long_description: For young adventurers who can't resist going off-trail to splash in the creek, the kids' Merrell Spinster Deck Shoes keep little feet covered and comfortable in and out of the water. Synthetic uppers offer durable, flexible support; rip-and-stick closure at ankles allow easy on/off; neoprene linings are water-friendly and won't absorb odor. Foam footbeds with Aegis(R) antimicrobial treatment offer cushioning and resist odor; nylon shanks provide all-day support. Durable rubber outsoles on the kids' Merrell Spinster Deck Shoes provide traction over a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: For young adventurers who can't resist going off-trail to splash in the creek, the kids' Merrell Spinster Deck Shoes keep little feet covered and comfortable in and out of the water.
